http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs
(translate using http://www.nifty.com/globalgate)

has daily updates about various lectures being held.

For example:
Mito group historical-records hall 
Topic = "the false charge of the Serizawa duck (Serizawa Kamo) is 
revealed" 
Topic = "Saito 1 and the Yamaguchi house." The relation of Saito 1 
(Saito Hajime) and Higuchi 1" <<< who is this Higuchi 1?  Does 
anyone know?

Ofcourse we cannot attend these meetings but the importance 
following all of these events is to realize the variety in 
discussion and active/ongoing research

It seems that new documents are found everyweek...take for instance 
a document with Inoue Genzaburo and Rintaro Okita's name was found 
in a house (I think)...and people should be patient/cautious until 
these documents have been verified or atleast closely examined.

http://www.suzutoo.co.jp/hn2000_top.html
http://blog.drecom.jp/hinojyukuhonjin_kentoukai/ <<< pic of document
